total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the size of the input grid.
Q2: Create a new grid of the same size.
Q3: Fill the new grid with 1s in every cell.
Q4: Identify every second cell in each row starting from the second cell.
Q5: Replace the identified cells with 0s.
Q6: Repeat the process for every second row starting from the second row.
